name: MotorStorm 3D Rift
description:
MotorStorm® 3D Rift offers a taste of the hit game MotorStorm® Pacific Rift, now with full 3D functionality. Choose from 10 detailed and exciting tracks on an exotic island to tear through using a variety of off-road vehicles. Supports both 2D and 3D gameplay.

Download the game today!
